name: Evil Litle Mermaid
description:
This is a game designed for Unity Learn - Create with Code Game Jam. Create with Code - Game Jam Submission (CWC Game Jam)

You are a diver trapped in the depths of the sea by an evil mermaid. She is sending waves of deadly fish at you. Grab your trusty harpoon and fight! 

WASD to Move.

Mouse movement for direction.

Left click to fire harpoon. Enjoy! :)
